about.title: About Me
about.content:
Hello! I'm Alex Chen

I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating digital solutions that make a difference. I specialize in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

When I'm not coding, you can find me hiking, reading tech blogs, or experimenting with new frameworks and tools.

Education

BS in Computer Science from Stanford University

Certifications

  • AWS Certified Developer
  • Google Cloud Professional Developer
  • React Native Certification

projects.title: My Projects
projects.content:
Featured Projects

E-Commerce Platform

A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

Technologies: React, Node.js, MongoDB, Stripe API

Task Management App

A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

Technologies: Vue.js, Firebase, Socket.io

Weather Dashboard

A responsive weather application that displays current conditions and forecasts for multiple locations with interactive charts.

Technologies: JavaScript, Chart.js, Weather API

resume.title: Resume
resume.content:
Work Experience

Senior Developer - Tech Solutions Inc.

2020 - Present

Lead a team of 5 developers in building scalable web applications for enterprise clients. Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 40%.

Full Stack Developer - Digital Creations

2018 - 2020

Developed and maintained multiple client websites and web applications. Collaborated with designers to implement responsive UI/UX designs.

Junior Developer - Startup Labs

2017 - 2018

Assisted in the development of MVP products. Gained experience in fast-paced agile development environment.
